tool_description: Get some pseudo random dice or deck of cards API
name: Pseudo Random Gambling Games
title: Pseudo Random Gambling Games

api_list.name: Dices
api_list.description:
Return pseudo random result for stack of dices. 

Max: 100 dices at the same time.

api_list.name: Deck
api_list.description:
Return deck of cards in pseudo random order.

Suit: Spades, Clubs, Diamonds and Hearts
Value: Ace, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, Jack, Queen and King
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pseudo-random-gambling-games.p.rapidapi.com/deck"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pseudo-random-gambling-games.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pseudo-random-gambling-games.p.rapidapi.com/deck"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pseudo-random-gambling-games.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
